snippet: The Danish brewer lowered its net profit forecast for the year because of the declining currency in Russia, where it is the market leader.
lead_paragraph: The Danish brewer lowered its net profit forecast for the year because of the declining currency in Russia, where it is the market leader.

headline.main: Weak Ruble Weighs on Earnings at Carlsberg
headline.print_headline: Weak Ruble Weighs on Carlsberg Earnings
